name: Planet Hell (Darius Alvanez)
description:
Game Summary

Planet Hell is an arcade shooter game where the premise is that anyone who dies ends up on Planet Hell. You play as one of three main characters, working to break out a fourth "mysterious benefactor" and escape Planet Hell. To do this, you advance through 6 randomly chosen levels to fight the final boss and beat the game.

Along the way you encounter several enemy types and gain different upgrades to help you conquer Planet Hell. You will also unlock new features as you play, so not every failed attempt at beating the game will be a complete loss. You can read the Game Manual or visit the website for some more information.

Installation Instructions

For the Installer Version: Run the installer and click "yes" or "more info" + "run anyway" on the security prompt. Follow the instructions in the setup wizard.

For the EXE Version: Download the ZIP file and extract it's contents to a folder. Run the Planet Hell executable, clicking "yes" or "more info" + "run anyway" on the security prompt. The game should launch by then.
